resources.string: Show warnings when suspicious keywords are detected.
Microphone permission is required for live scam detection. Tap \'Open App Permissions\' to enable.
Final Year Academic Project Built for Android Educational Demo.

ScamShield can listen for suspicious keywords during calls to warn you about potential scams.

By consenting you agree that the app will process call audio locally on your device to detect scam-related keywords. No audio will be uploaded unless you explicitly opt-in to cloud services. The feature may not work reliably on all devices due to OS restrictions.

Do you consent to enable live detection?
